extendedInfo.description: DESCRIPTIONEmergenSeeÂ® Personal Security System's Patented Technology sends Live Streaming Video, Audio, GPS Location and Movement to Pre-Selected Contacts when serious and potentially dangerous situations are encountered.  EmergenSeeÂ® is discreet, fast and easy to use.  With just one tap of the app, contacts can immediately see, hear and follow the incident as it unfolds and effectively react to the situation.LIVE VIDEO & AUDIOOnce EmergenSeeÂ® is launched, it streams live video and audio to a secure server that is instantly reviewed by your pre-selected contacts or public safety.GPS LOCATIONEmergenSeeâs unique Geo-Fencing technology and your smartphoneâs GPS ensures that your pre-set contacts will be instantly and accurately notified of your exact location, when an incident starts.MOVEMENT TRACKINGYour phoneâs GPS tracks your exact location. EmergenSee will be able to share your exact location information with your contacts, even  if youâre on the move. INSTANT ALERTS / CONTACTS ALERTEDA distress email with audio/visual alerts are instantly sent to pre-set contacts, when an incident occurs.STEALTH MODE RECORDINGStealth mode turns your smartphoneâs screen black to give the illusion that itâs off. Meanwhile, EmergenSee continues to stream information to your emergency contacts until youâve reached a secure location.INSTANT TEXTING NOTIFICATIONSIn a particularly tense situation, you donât want to draw unwanted attention to yourself by making a phone call. Instead, you launch EmergenSee, start an incident, and begin instant messaging with your pre-set contacts.VIRTUAL ESCORTEmergenSeeÂ®'s Pre-Set Timer Alert - The Timer will Send Alert Notices to pre-set contacts, should something happen and you are unable to communicate.BROADCAST ALERTSWith Professional Monitoring Center or Dispatcher Packages, Mass broadcast alerts to an entire network can prevent you from walking into harms way.REAL-TIME TEXTING (CHAT)With Professional Monitoring Center or Dispatcher Packages, two way texting communications is available.

reviews.title: Poorly designed; uninstall.
reviews.comment: Won\'t move past create account/sign in screen. IPhone version functions correctly; what happened here? Since installing this app, my phone\'s ringer keeps being put into silent; issue with app\'s control of hardware settings? Disappointed GS4 user running 4.2.2 :(
reviews.author: Kimberly Stacy

reviews.title: Force Closes
reviews.comment: Used to love the safe feeling, went to show someone the app the other day, now it hasn\'t opened in forever. Stops and force closes immediately. Using Droid 4 on ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force Closing
reviews.comment: Well not get past \"Create Account\". I\'ve uninstalled, reinstalled, and continues force choosing when creating an account. Very frustrating. I have the galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Great product for business and family
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: This is fantastic! It\'s nice knowing ill be safe!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My Best Protection APP
reviews.comment: Great app, and I am very happy with it. Simply Amazing! Unbelievable how it contacts everyone in multiple ways and gives location, video, audio\342\200\246 It certainly would take me a long time to do what this app does with just a touch of a button. I hope I never have to use it, but I\'m glad I purchased it for my peace of mind. Highly recommend it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t work at all.....
reviews.author: A Google User
